Comments_List: I learned to make connections between seemingly incredibly disparate figures through the large themes Dr. Stepto identified in the beginnings of class.
I appreciated that this class allowed students to use personal autobiography as a means of thinking through public life.
The class could use more opportunities for students to discuss with each other, but other than that, it was just right.

I thoroughly enjoyed this course and the texts it engaged. Professor Stepto provided helpful and supportive feedback with writing assignments and was always willing to help students through the challenges of writing autobiographical papers.
I would recommend this course to a graduate student who was looking for an opportunity to think and write creatively.
Yes, Professor Stepto is gracious, warm, brilliant, and understanding. It was an honor to be in this course with him.
